page.title: 06THE GHOSTS OF COGENHOE.
page.content: { Ghost spotting}is still quite a popular hobby in Cogenhoe. Every now and then groups of teenagers have congregated in{St. Peter's Churchyard and on a patch of rough grazing land to the South. However, cynics would claim that white tombstones have been mistaken for gloomy apparitions. The supernatural happenings revolve around 2 ghosts _{both young girls. The first has been sighted in a long print dress with a basket over her arm. Rumour has it she was jilted by the local Rector's son and put an end to her life. Elsewhere in the village, electric lights have been turning themselves on and off, doors have bolted themselves and shuffling and heavy breathing have made strong men weak at the knees. Redecoration at the house has revealed the negative of a{dead crippled child!
